title: Best Marinated Mushrooms
ingredients: ['250ml water', '675g fresh mushrooms, stems removed', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '3 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons dried parsley', '1/8 teaspoon onion powder']
